description: Arkansas quarterback commitment Connor Noland pitched a complete game Monday with two football assistants looking on.
title: QB commit puts on show for Hog coaches
title_page: QB commit puts on show for Hog coaches
text:
Connor Noland (13) passed for 844 yards and eight touchdowns for Greenwood last season, and he has exhibited a 90-mph fastball as a pitcher for the Bulldogsâ€™ baseball team. - Photo by Melissa Gerrits
Arkansas quarterback commitment Connor Noland pitched a complete game Monday with tight ends coach Barry Lunney Jr. and running backs coach Reggie Mitchell looking on.
Nolan allowed three hits and struck out 10 while not allowing a walk in Greenwood's 3-0 victory over Russellville. He also was two-of-three at the plate with one RBI.
He's 6-1 for the season and has an ERA of 0.47 along with 70 strikeouts in 44 innings. He's allowed only seven walks. At the plate, he's hitting .359, two home runs, 22 RBIs and has scored 21 runs. Greenwood has won 13 straight games and stands at 21-6 for the season.
